actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

official_title: A bill to encourage and strengthen a National Health Promotion Program by providing technical and financial support to Governor's Advisory Councils on Health Promotion, established to promote public-private health promotion partnerships, and for other purposes.
short_title: Act for a Fit and Healthy America

summary.text: Act for a Fit and Healthy America - Mandates allotments to States for Governor's Advisory Councils on Health Promotion. Requires the Councils to establish, oversee, and report on statewide health promotion programs. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: Act for a Fit and Healthy America

A bill to encourage and strengthen a National Health Promotion Program by providing technical and financial support to Governor's Advisory Councils on Health Promotion, established to promote public-private health promotion partnerships, and for other purposes.
